channel.title: Coders oppertunity ;)
channel.description:
hi, i am offeriing a coder a good oppertunity!.. please not the coder has to fill in a form b4 applying. of course as my coder you will be co-owner. and of course have the same rights as mee. but you will have to proov your good work by makiin an update for me. finding a good code for me 2 use to make the server beta ;).. please note i will be startiin the server from skratch as iit will be no fun other wise. as you proov ur strengths .. we will move on to bigger and better things, sutch as web clients and clients. pleasefill iin thiis form iif you would liike a posiitiion here..
[code] [code]Name :
Special skills :
why you woul be good for the job :
wha iis the highest diffeculty tut you have done b4.. [proof iif you can] Wink
would you continue to help me make good updates reularly?.. [/code][/code]
